summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Insurance page with two tabs (Employee Insurance and Business Insurance). All features working correctly including ESIC checkbox functionality, bulk upload, and template downloads.
passed_tests: Insurance page renamed from 'Employee Insurance' to 'Insurance'
Two tabs present: Employee Insurance and Business Insurance
Employee Insurance tab shows ESIC column in table
When ESIC=NO, all insurance detail fields are populated
Add Employee Insurance dialog has ESIC checkbox
ESIC checkbox hides/shows insurance detail fields correctly
Employee Insurance bulk upload dialog works with template download
Business Insurance tab shows correct columns: Sl.No, Name of Insurance, Vehicle No., Insurance Company, Date of Issuance, Due Date, Status
Business Insurance add record dialog works with all required fields
Business Insurance bulk upload dialog works with template download
API: GET /api/insurance returns employee insurance records
API: POST /api/insurance creates ESIC-covered employee (only emp_code required)
API: POST /api/insurance creates non-ESIC employee with all fields
API: GET /api/business-insurance returns business insurance records
API: POST /api/business-insurance creates business insurance records
API: GET /api/import/templates/insurance downloads employee insurance template
API: GET /api/import/templates/business-insurance downloads business insurance template
seed_data_creation: Test insurance records created via API during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Insurance page fully tested with both Employee Insurance and Business Insurance tabs. All CRUD operations, ESIC functionality, bulk upload, and template downloads verified working. 12 pytest tests passed.
